title: The Art of Christmas
description: Every ornament has a story.Tyler Ramsey is in trouble. He just doesn't know it yet. It's nearly Christmas, and the safe world he has constructed for himself is about to implode. Is it bad luck? Is he doomed to be one of life's losers? Or is there Something greater at work? A reassembled Christmas tree and its ornaments are about to take Tyler on a journey of redemption and healing he never anticipated.
author: Matt   Anderson
